Banner.Description: I am a software engineer from Porto, passionate about coding, learning, and bringing interesting ideas to life. Solving problems one line of code at a time! I'm passionate about backend development and DevOps, with a strong focus on scalable, high-performance systems. I love building robust APIs & microservices and ensuring smooth cloud & infrastructure operations.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs:
I strive to stay at the cutting edge of technology 
and continuously advance my skills in the ever-evolving field of software 
development.

My background in computer systems engineering, coupled with 
a strong interest in mobile computing, has equipped me with a broad and 
versatile understanding of modern technologies. I am always eager to expand 
my knowledge and explore innovative solutions to complex problems

Remaining at the forefront of technology is a personal priority. I take pride in 
exploring new tools and patterns that enhance the performance, security, and 
usability of software applications. With a sharp eye for detail and a commitment 
to industry best practices, I consistently deliver high-quality, impactful results 
that address the unique needs of each project

My goal is to contribute to a forward-thinking organization that values innovation 
and collaboration. By leveraging my skills and insights, I aim to build exceptional 
software, embrace meaningful challenges, and grow as a versatile and innovative 
professional in the field of software engineering
Some of the technologies I have worked in include:
Contact.Title: Reach out!
Contact.Content: I will gladly speak to you in case you are interested. Shoot me an email and I'll get back to you as soon as i can
